notConfigured.title: TaskMaster AI is not configured
notConfigured.description: TaskMaster helps break down complex projects into manageable tasks with AI-powered assistance

features.aiPowered: AI-Powered Task Management: Break complex projects into manageable subtasks
features.prdTemplates: PRD Templates: Generate tasks from Product Requirements Documents
features.dependencyTracking: Dependency Tracking: Understand task relationships and execution order
features.progressVisualization: Progress Visualization: Kanban boards and detailed task analytics
features.cliIntegration: CLI Integration: Use taskmaster commands for advanced workflows

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with TaskMaster
gettingStarted.subtitle: TaskMaster is initialized! Here's what to do next:

createPRD.title: Create a Product Requirements Document (PRD)
createPRD.description: Discuss your project idea and create a PRD that describes what you want to build.

generateTasks.title: Generate Tasks from PRD
generateTasks.description: Once you have a PRD, ask your AI assistant to parse it and TaskMaster will automatically break it down into manageable tasks with implementation details.

analyzeTasks.title: Analyze & Expand Tasks
analyzeTasks.description: Ask your AI assistant to analyze task complexity and expand them into detailed subtasks for easier implementation.

startBuilding.title: Start Building
startBuilding.description: Ask your AI assistant to begin working on tasks, update their status, and add new tasks as your project evolves.

gettingStarted.tip: ğŸ’¡ Tip: Start with a PRD to get the most out of TaskMaster's AI-powered task generation

setupModal.title: TaskMaster Setup
setupModal.subtitle: Interactive CLI for {{projectName}}
setupModal.completed: TaskMaster setup completed! You can now close this window.

helpGuide.title: Getting Started with TaskMaster
helpGuide.subtitle: Your guide to productive task management

proTips.title: ğŸ’¡ Pro Tips
proTips.search: Use the search bar to quickly find specific tasks
proTips.views: Switch between Kanban, List, and Grid views using the view toggles
proTips.filters: Use filters to focus on specific task statuses or priorities
proTips.details: Click on any task to view detailed information and manage subtasks

noMatchingTasks.title: No tasks match your filters
noMatchingTasks.description: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.
